title: Supporting Secondary STEM Educator Preparation at TCUP Institutions
description: Encourages proposals from TCUP-eligible institutions to establish new or enhance existing secondary STEM teacher preparation degrees with up-to-date curricula, faculty resources and technology to advance STEM education for Tribal and Native communities.Encourages proposals from TCUP-eligible institutions to establish new or enhance existing secondary STEM teacher preparation degrees with up-to-date curricula, faculty resources and technology to advance STEM education for Tribal and Native communities.

title: Education and Broadening Participation in Earth Sciences (EAR EBP)
description: Supports research, education and professional development initiatives that engage a wide range of audiences and enhance participation in Earth sciences, including undergraduate research, postdoctoral fellowships and early-career faculty development.Supports research, education and professional development initiatives that engage a wide range of audiences and enhance participation in Earth sciences, including undergraduate research, postdoctoral fellowships and early-career faculty development.
